page.title: 13Industry,Sherburn-in-Elmet.
page.content: Bowyers make pork pies,scotch eggs,black pudding and sausages in large quantities.Moxon do general haulage with 45 trucks.They deliver bottles from Linpac to Scotland and Ireland.Kiers buy buses,do them up,and sell them.They have been open 23 years.They export coaches.Linpac have 2 factories,they make plastic moulds and bottles,the biggest they make is a 2 litre bottle.They export plastic pellets which are melted down to make plastic plates.Lancasters make cases from wood,they deliver locally.Halls Omec and French Kier Constructions fix equipment together to be used down the mines.Knottingley Storage have two sheds of fertilizer.Elmet Joiners sell ready made kitchens.Elco make generators,they export 90%.Bibbys make animal foods and sell to farmers.These industries are on the trading estate.
